1�Skip the event?Yes.No.
1�You cannot enter the battlefield at present. Please wait a little longer.4
1�Skip the event?Yes.No.
1�It can't be...! This is.
1�Ordinarily, Full Moon Fountain is brimming with celestial radiance, but with the loss of that light...
1�...This must be what the Yagudo king was talking aboutaru!
1�But wait...If that were true... When the summoner tried to call the great avatar twenty years ago...
1�Blastaru! They've found me!
e!�You've gone too farrr this time, Ajido-Marujido. The Star Sibyl has given us authorrrization to bring you to justice.
1�Come quietly or there'll be trrrouble!Ajido-Marujido, I hereby arrest you for crrrimes committed against Heavens Tower!
1�Oh, it's you. Nothing bettaru to do than follow me around?
1�...Well, you mightaru as well come with me.Come and behold the truth...
..�Dammitaru! It's just as I feared!
1�Hold it rrright ther
1�And this time, they look serious.Time for you to leave!
1�So cold and dark...
1�I thought that perhaps the Stars and the Moon might have returned to the fountain... Nothing has changed...
1�Semih Lafihna, I thank you for bringing me here. I never thought I would be able to stand in this place again.
1�Star Sibyl...
1�That day, twenty years ago...From that day forward, I honestly believed that I would never return to Full Moon Fountain again.
1�The place of Karaha-Baruha's death... A place enveloped in frigid darkness.
1�I felt that Windurst would share the same fate as this fountain. A bleak future of eternal night...
1�I turned my eyes from the darkness and pretended it didn't exist... I ceased to look for the future of Windurst, the future of our people.
1�In a world without that guiding light, my fear of the darkness froze my feet upon the path...
1�Star Sibyl, you mustn't be so harsh on yourself.
1�Perhaps you have forgotten that your guidance has allowed Windurst to exist in peace these past twenty years.
1�To the citizens of Windurst, you are the light that shines in the darkness. You are their guiding star.
1�...Semih Lafihna.Thank you...
1�The gentle strength of the Sibyl Guards has always been there to hold me steady...
1�For your sake as well as mine, we must understand our situation.
1�We must discover where we stand, and what lies out there before us.
!?�Joker!?
1�You, it can't be...!What do you mean to do...!?
1�It seems you still recognize me, though my form has changed.
1�However, you have nothing to fear. I have not come to seek vengeance for past wrongs. And do not be concerned for the Mithra; they have not been harmed.
1�I have come to tell you of the star of hope that you have called forth...
1�I must tell you of all that star has set in motion upon Vana'diel.
1�Star of hope I called forth...?
1�I could stand my grief no longer... I wished for the help of Karaha-Baruha, dead these long years...
1�Yes, that wish... That wish reached the faint amount of power that remained of the Stars and the Moon.
1�And then, with the strands of magic that bind us together, Karaha-Baruha and I returned from Death's dark hall.
4�You should be surprised, Star Sibyl. Your hope--your wish--will aid in the restoration of the power of the Stars and the Moon...and bring us closer to the moment we have been waiting for.
1�However, for things to be set in motion, I need you to wish alongside me.
1�Star Sibyl!!!
1�It seems your star of hope has already arrived. That brilliant incandescence has shown us through several crossroads.
1�I speak to you now, Star of Hope.Here, I will await your final illumination...
1�Lead the darkened soul to this place of the Stars and the Moon once more...! A time for miracles is upon us!
.!�...Star Sibyl!
!!�Joker!
1�With this song, the bearer of darkness will be drawn here from any distance.
1�We have grantarued your wish. Now return to us the Star Sibyl!
1�...The ancient people... You speak of the Kuluu...
1�Very well. You may approach. Let us have   play the song.
1� , the rest is up to you. No mattaru what happens, you must protect the Star Sibyl.
1�... . Our guiding star. You have braved much to reach this point.
1�You have navigated a galaxy of stars to bring light to the land of hope.
1�It was the wish of the Star Sibyl that began this epic tale. But it is you who must realize the truth.
1�It was your will that led us to this moment...
1�Your brilliant incandescence will show the way. Call the Stars and the Moon to this place once more.
1�...You have come.
1�We who have been divided...
4�Will become whole once more...
1�...Th-this...!? This is...summoning magic...!?
4�Enough! You will cease this...!
4�Be still, my children!
4� , we've done it! He's been weakened enough...
1�Dammitaru, the Cardians are waking up!
!!�I have been waiting, Star Sibyl. Waiting for you to return to this fountain.
1�Remember, Star Sibyl.You have followed the epic prophecy from the age of the first Star Sibyl to the day I greeted the spectre of death.

1�That prophecy began with the fervent wish of the original Star Sibyl, with the Moon Reading she performed. In the same way that you entrusted your wish to the Stars and the Moon that bathe this land in their power...
1�Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, �[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.
1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.

1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.Full Moon Fountain.Doll of the Dead.Moon Reading(pt.1).Moon Reading(pt.2).Moon Reading(pt.3).The Moonlit Path(pt.1).The Moonlit Path(pt.2).Waking the Beast(pt.1).Waking the Beast(pt.2).Battaru Royale.Romancing the Clone.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
l!�You see a yellowing sheet of parchment on the ground.The following words are hastily scrawled onto it:
1���Sap crystals from the Great Star Tree not permitted within.Those who disregard this rule shall be made paper-thin!��
1�Greetings,  , 'tis splendid to see you kicking and well.Though whether you stay that way for long, only time will tell.
1�Greetings,  , 'tis splendid to see you kicking and well.Though whether you stay that way for long, only time will tell.
1�With the coffers running dry, we set you a mission to keep us afloat.But instead of coin, you return with whetted knives at our throat.
1�That you have sided with the rebels is as plain as day.For this grievous crime against your liege, have you nothing to say?
1�But a single traitorous adventurer is of no consequence to our ambition.You are dishonorably discharged from the Empire--this is our final decision.
1�That's an acute case of sour grapes you have there, Domina Shantotto.You won't ever fulfill your twisted ambition with such a childish attitude.
1�And if you think that harnessing the power of the protocrystals alone is enough to conquer the world, you're gravely mistaken.You need manpower and raw military might, not to mention--
1�Sour grapes and military might?Your uneducated comments are a royal slight!
1�That we would resort to brute force to subjugate all of Vana'diel,is a most ridiculous notion that should be discarded like a pamama peel.
1�By shedding light on facts with which you have no familiarity,we shall relieve you of some ignorance--consider it a form of charity.
1�When you still served the Empire,  , and stood at our beck and call,we entrusted you with enchanted seals, this part you surely recall?
1�But truth be told, the seals' true function is not to amplifythe power of the protocrystals like we said--that was an outright lie.
1�With a little imagination we devised something considerably worse.The seals, you see, shall envelop Vana'diel in a dreadful curs
e!�What!?
1�The crystals lend their strength to the seals and not the other way 'round.
1�All living things will succumb to our will--golly, we love the way that sounds!
1�In this way and by our hand, a perfect world order shall arise:a Vana'diel that exists solely for our pleasure, all the way to the skies!
1�So sound the horns and beat the drums!The everlasting Shantotto Empire is come!
1�H-have you lost your mind-ethy!?
1�Lost our mind, you dare suggest?Why, this is us at our brilliant best!
1�And just so you know and waste not a trip,
1�The crystals would have fully absorbed the curse by now--right down to the last slip.
1�But now the time is come for the rebellion to be quashed.Of all independent thinking, Vana'diel must be washed!
1�We have taken the liberty of raising an army of clones.They shall rid the world of our enemies, leaving nothing but bones.
1�Go, loyal minions, and erase from the face of Vana'dielthose who would hinder our ascension, and glory from us stea
